Deemos blocks the staff as it spins but it several times slices into his
hands and wrists.

Deemos: Come, now, Aerotaur, you know very well what I mean. It's a joy to
kill someone who everyone THINKS is innocent. It's no fun to kill those who
everyone knows are guilty.

Deemos smiled again. He steps backwards, holding the machette in a blocking
position. Train Wreck stepped up behind Aerotaur.

Train Wreck: Don't move.

Train Wreck aimed the cannon he was holding sideways, and fires the cannon
at Aerotaur's ribs. A cowardly sneak attack, but it made no difference to
these Maximals what tactics they used.

Deemos: I was thinking of sounding the retreat anyway. Not that I won't be
back...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 10:11 PM
Subject: Re: War at Chivtron's Base!!!


> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Have you no soul?  How can want to kill Trinity for a pathetic little
> bite and leave me when I've done you so much damage?  No, I think you
would
> kill her and then continue to fight against us.  I CANNOT LET HER DIE!"
He
> flies back releasing the pressure on his machete.  "Die my nemesis!"  He
> flies straight at Deemos staff spinning.
